definition: name/noun (part of speech)/place (e.g. among winners)/famous/classifier for people

sentences.english: It is a Guangzhou has a long history of 2222 years of cultural city.
sentences.chinese: 廣州是一座有2222多年悠久歷史的文化名城。

sentences.english: It is one of the best-historical, cultural cities at the state level in China.
sentences.chinese: 它是國家級歷史文化名城。

sentences.english: Introduce the famous historical and cultural city in Hei Long jiang ?
sentences.chinese: 請介紹一下黑龍江省的國家及省級歷史文化名城？

sentences.english: Protecting and displaying the historical and cultural heritage of the city ?
sentences.chinese: 保護和展示歷史文化名城的風貌。

sentences.english: "Taihu Pearl" Wuxi is a three-year history of the southern city.
sentences.chinese: “太湖明珠”無錫是一座具有三千年歷史的江南名城。

sentences.english: A person of many histories of into live to make Qingdao become a city of the most young history.
sentences.chinese: 許多歷史名人的入住使青島成爲最年輕的歷史名城。

sentences.english: Xi’an, as a famous city with profound historical and cultural significance in China, enjoys a history that can be dated back to several thousand years ago.
sentences.chinese: 西安作爲中國的歷史文化名城擁有幾千年的歷史。

sentences.english: Above all, since Ming Dynasty, it has become the symbol of Guilin history and culture, an important part in Guilin history.
sentences.chinese: 王城史是桂林歷史文化名城史的重要組成部分。

sentences.english: This historical city was founded in 912.
sentences.chinese: 這座歷史名城建於公元912年。

sentences.english: The Dayan Old Town is a World Historical and Cultural City.
sentences.chinese: 麗江大研古城是世界歷史文化名城。

sentences.english: In 2001 Shanhaiguan Pass district won the title of national historical and cultural town.
sentences.chinese: 2001年，山海關區又榮膺國家歷史文化名城稱號。

sentences.english: Jiaxing is a vintage town marinating in a thick cultural atmosphere.
sentences.chinese: 嘉興是一座有着濃厚文化積澱的歷史名城。

sentences.english: It is located 5 minutes from the main plaza of the historic city centre -Macau's world heritage site.
sentences.chinese: 澳門的歷史文化名城中心亦是在5分鐘步行距離之內。

sentences.english: Jiangdu power machinery factories in the East China historic city of Yangzhou.
sentences.chinese: 江都市東方動力機械廠位於中國歷史名城揚州。

sentences.english: Fully embodies the history cultural international metropolis our city of image.
sentences.chinese: 充分體現我們這個歷史文化國際都市名城的形象。

sentences.english: Lijiang in Yunnan, is one of the Culture Heritage resort as well as the famous traveling resort.
sentences.chinese: 雲南麗江是世界文化遺產地，也是著名的旅遊名城。

definition: (military) strategic town/(fig.) major center (for commerce, culture or tourism etc)
Dacheng county in Langfang 廊坊[Lang2 fang2], Hebei/Tacheng township in Changhua county 彰化縣|彰化县[Zhang1 hua4 xian4], Taiwan
Xincheng or Hsincheng township in Hualien County 花蓮縣|花莲县[Hua1 lian2 Xian4], east Taiwan
Shuicheng county in Liupanshui 六盤水|六盘水[Liu4 pan2 shui3], Guizhou
the finest place in the nation (often used in reference to the capital city)/also written 首善之地[shou3 shan4 zhi1 di4]
capital city of an autonomous region
Shancheng district of Hebi city 鶴壁市|鹤壁市[He4 bi4 shi4], Henan
Suangcheng county level city in Harbin 哈爾濱|哈尔滨[Ha1 er3 bin1], Heilongjiang
the birthplace (of sth good)/the cradle (e.g. of art)
